analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Support $670 Put Wall (9k OI), $669 (7k OI). Resistance $680 (16k OI), $681 Call Wall (17k OI). QQQ: Support $600 (6k OI), $595 Put Wall (7k OI). Resistance $610 (10k OI), $615 Call Wall (13k OI). SPX: 6789 support per Twitter

QQQ: Range-bound between $595 Put Wall and $615 Call Wall, with bias toward Max Pain $625. TSLA: Critical support at 471 per Twitter - break determines broader tech momentum
